field.name: ON_THE_FLY
field.desc: On the fly transfer can be applied on DMA which source and destination addresses are at the different bus domain.

reg.name: ISRC
reg.desc: A2A DMA initial source address register.

reg.name: IDST
reg.desc: A2A DMA initial destination address register.

field.name: CNT
field.desc: DMA initial terminate count register for channel x.

reg.name: CSRC
reg.desc: A2A DMA current source address register.

reg.name: CDST
reg.desc: A2A DMA current destination address register.

field.name: CHANNEL1_INT
field.desc: Channel 1 Interrupt active, clear interrupt after write.

field.name: CHANNEL0_INT
field.desc: Channel 0 Interrupt active, clear interrupt after write.

field.name: LOCK_CNT
field.desc: Bus lock counts at on-the-fly mode.

field.name: SRC_MSIZE
field.desc: Number of data items to be transferred (of width CTLx.SRC_TR_WIDTH or CTLx.DST_TR_WIDTH)

field.name: FIFO_EMPTY
field.desc: Indicates if there is data left in the channel FIFO.

field.name: CH_PRIOR
field.desc: Channel priority. A priority of 7 is the highest priority, and 0 is the lowest.

field.name: HDMA_REQ1_CH
field.desc: This bit is to indicate the Hardware DMA IF1 is used for which FIFO

field.name: HDMA_REQ2_CH
field.desc: his bit is to indicate the Hardware DMA IF2 is used for which FIFO

field.name: MONO_STEREO
field.desc: When the bit is set to 1, transmitter is at Mono mode and data output from left channel.

field.name: MASTER_SLAVE
field.desc: This bit decides that transmitter acts as a master or slave.

reg.name: FIFOSTS
reg.desc: his register shows FIFO status and interrupts trigger level.

field.name: TX_FIFO_LEVEL_EN
field.desc: This bit enables the interrupt when Tx FIFO trigger level is reached.

field.name: RX_FIFO_LEVEL_EN
field.desc: This bit enables the interrupt when Rx FIFO trigger level is reached.

field.name: RX_FIFO_OVERRUN_EN
field.desc: This bit enables the interrupt when Rx FIFO overrun condition occurred.

field.name: INT_STS
field.desc: Interrupt status and clear bit. Write 1 to clear interrupt flag.

field.name: INT_EN
field.desc: PWM timer interrupt enable/disable. PWM timer will assert an interrupt when PWMTx_CNTR value is equal to the value of PWMTx_LRC or PWMTx_HRC.

field.name: SINGLE_MOD
field.desc: In single mode PWMTx_CNTR is not increased anymore after it reaches value equal to the PWMTx_LRC value. In periodic mode PWMTx_CNTR is restarted after it reaches value equal to the PWMTx_LRC value.

field.name: ENDIANEESE
field.desc: Endian control when CPU access to data buffer.

field.name: PWR_CTRL
field.desc: Power control type for SD/MMC cards

value.name: CPU
value.desc: The SD/MMC card power is controlled by CPU

value.name: CD
value.desc: The SD/MMC card power is controlled by CD/DAT3

field.name: DETECT_CTRL
field.desc: Card detect type for SD cards

value.name: SWITCH
value.desc: The card detect function is used by mechanism

value.name: CD
value.desc: The card detect function is used by CD/DAT3

field.name: CMD_RSP_STS
field.desc: Command and response transfer interrupt status

field.name: CMD_RSP_INT_EN
field.desc: Command and response transfer interrupt enable

reg.name: CMDREST
reg.desc: SD/MMC command and response transfer register

reg.name: CMDRES
reg.desc: SD/MMC command and response transfer status register

field.name: CMD_RSP_BUS_ERR
field.desc: Card command and response bus conflict error

field.name: CMD_RSP_ERR
field.desc: Card command and response error status
